[[Image:Bayasabhad map.png|thumb|200px|right|A map showing the location of Bayasabhad on the continent of Essos.]]
'''Bayasabhad''' is a city located in the east of Essos on the shores of the [[Jade Sea]], east of the [[Red Waste]] and north of [[Qarth]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season2/#!/locations/qarth HBO viewers guide, season 2 map, Qarth entry]</ref>
sections.In the books:
In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Bayasabhad is one of the fabled lands of the mysterious east (along with [[Asshai]], Yi Ti, the Jogos Nhai, Kayakayanaya and [[Samyrian|Shamyriana]]). It is known for its warrior women who wear iron rings in their nipples and rubies in their cheeks. Representatives from Bayasabhad trade at [[Vaes Dothrak]].

Bayasabhad was once part of the Patrimony of Hyrkoon, which flourished west of the Bone Mountains but has since fallen.
